channel.title: I need some help please
channel.description:
I cant seem to figure out how to code npc combat, stance, walk, run, etc. I am trying to add the Emotes and GFX's for all of the barrows brothers and i dont know what to do( I'm not so good at this) so i was wondering if someone could make the code for me or just tell me what to do.
Im using Mezzy-Scape 508 source and client.
Please help
